title: cannot initialize torch.distributed with mpi backend
body_html:
I installed pytorch from source with mpi support, however when trying to initialize

torch.distributed.init_process_group(backend='mpi', init_methods='file:///filelocation', world_size=2)

it always return immediately and if you run torch.distributed.get_world_size() the returned value is 1.
body_text:
I installed pytorch from source with mpi support, however when trying to initialize
torch.distributed.init_process_group(backend='mpi', init_methods='file:///filelocation', world_size=2)

it always return immediately and if you run torch.distributed.get_world_size() the returned value is 1.
body:
I installed pytorch from source with mpi support, however when trying to initialize
```
torch.distributed.init_process_group(backend='mpi', init_methods='file:///filelocation', world_size=2)
```
it always return immediately and if you run `torch.distributed.get_world_size()` the returned value is 1.
